arts.ttl: Daniel Farke offers eyebrow-raising alternative issue to Leeds United’s Illan Meslier horror-show
arts.sum: Calamity struck yet again as Leeds United threw away a two-goal lead late on to only draw with strugglers Hull City, fingers pointed at Illan Meslier in the process. Hull 3-3 Leeds: Illan Meslier throws away the points

arts.ttl: Ruben Selles offers Hull City verdict after pulsating Leeds United draw
arts.sum: City roared into a fifth minute lead when man of the moment Kamara expertly lobbed Illian Meslier and it stayed that way until early in the second half, when To Tanaka curled in the equaliser, and then the Whites looked to have taken the game away from Selles' side with goals from Dan James and Joel Piroe. I think that action in the fifth minute (Kamara's goal) shows what we wanted to do and I think we continue going, being ourselves, the game was open.

arts.ttl: Hull star delivers perfect response to stun Leeds one day after having to apologise to fans
arts.sum: Kamara, 21, scored twice to get off the mark and force a brilliant 3-3 draw against Championship leaders Leeds United - just a day after having to apologise to his own club's fans

arts.ttl: Journalist claims Leeds could get rid of first-team ace in January
arts.sum: Leeds United striker Patrick Bamford has been linked with a move away from the club this month. According to journalist Ben Jacobs, Leeds will look to move him on before the transfer window closes. The 31-year-old has struggled for regular game time at the English club, and he has not found the back of the […] The post Journalist claims Leeds could get rid of first-team ace in January appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Ruben Selles praises Hull City stars after 'perfect game' against Leeds United
arts.sum: Hull City head coach Ruben Selles heaped praise on his players after their dramatic late fightback against Championship leaders Leeds United. Get Leeds United news to your phone with our WhatsApp community

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke addresses Illan Meslier criticism as Leeds United drop two vital points at Hull City
arts.sum: Leeds United boss Daniel Farke refused to criticise goalkeeper Illan Meslier after seeing his side throw away two points at lowly Hull City. Joao Pedro and Kamara scored in the final nine minutes to leave United frustrated.

arts.ttl: Transfer news and rumours: Vitor Reis to Brighton, Ben Sheaf to Leeds, Cauley Woodrow to Wrexham
arts.sum: Sports Mole rounds up the latest transfer news and rumours, including Vitor Reis to Brighton & Hove Albion, Ben Sheaf to Leeds United and Cauley Woodrow to Wrexham.

arts.ttl: Hull City player ratings vs Leeds United as Abu Kamara writes sensational script
arts.sum: Leeds recovered in the second half to lead 3-1 through goals from Ao Tanaka, Dan James and Joel Piroe before City's late recovery saw Joao Pedro turn in from close range with 10 minutes to go, and then with the Tigers pushing for a leveler, Kamara pummelled in a volley to earn a deserved point. City roared into a fifth-minute lead when Kamara raced onto Mason Burstow's defence-splitting pass to lift a fine effort over Illan Meslier and into the net.

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: leaders Leeds drop points in six-goal thriller at Hull
arts.sum: Abu Kamara stars as Hull hold Leeds to 3-3 draw Coventry left reeling by two late Norwich goals Abu Kamara ended a difficult week with two goals as struggling Hull claimed a breathless 3-3 draw at home to Leeds, the league leaders. Kamara apologised on Friday for posting “wrongly timed” emojis on former club Portsmouth’s Instagram account after Hull’s defeat to Middlesbrough on New Year’s Day. But redemption was as satisfying as it was dramatic as he bookended the scoring with a lovely early lob over a stranded Illan Meslier before scoring a precise shot after 89 minutes. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Leeds stunned as Hull battle back for dramatic point
arts.sum: Abu Kamara ended a difficult week with two goals as struggling Hull claimed a breathless 3-3 draw at home to league leaders Leeds.
